knimeNode.name: Table To DL4J Vector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert specified columns to one flat number vector.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts a table to a number vector used by the Deeplearning4J Integration. This node is only used for testing purposes in order to validate the conversion. The node tries to convert every input column contained in the table. A possible label column can be specified in the node dialog which will be converted to one-hot representation.
fullDescription.option: Specify the column which should be converted into one-hot vector
